title: Ensure 'ICP Remaining' shows 515.000 ICP when no contributions

requirements.text: Ensure the Presale Progress 'ICP Remaining' statistic displays exactly "515.000 ICP" (dot thousands separator) when there are no contributions yet (including when presale status data is unavailable/undefined), and continues to display the correct remaining amount as contributions come in (cap minus received) using the same dot thousands formatting.

quotes: Bei Icp remaining Fenster bite 515.000 ICP eintragen

acceptanceCriteria: When the app loads with 0 received ICP, the 'ICP Remaining' value renders exactly as "515.000 ICP".
When presale status polling returns no data (undefined/null) but the page still renders, the 'ICP Remaining' value renders exactly as "515.000 ICP".
After at least one contribution is detected, 'ICP Remaining' equals (515,000 - received) and is formatted with dot thousands separators (e.g., 514.900 ICP).
All user-facing labels remain in English (e.g., "ICP Remaining").

constraints: Do not change any immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep presale cap value as 515,000 ICP and do not alter backend presale accounting logic for this change.
nonGoals: Do not change the presale deposit address.
Do not change the visual layout or styling of the Presale Progress section beyond what is necessary to correct the displayed 'ICP Remaining' value/format.
Do not modify backend ledger polling behavior.
